vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
βρᾰβ-εῖον,
Epic dialect βρᾰβ-ήϊον, τό, prize in the games, [NT+4th c.BC+]
__II wand, baton given as a prize, τιμηθεὶς χρυσείῳβ. [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: prize (from a contest or foot race)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
prize (from a contest or foot race)
a prize, bestowed on victors in the public games, such as a crown, wreath, chaplet, garland, etc., 1Cor. 9:24; Phil. 3:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 授與競賽得勝者的獎杯, 獎賞
2) 隱喻從天上而來, 給予基督徒好品格的賞賜 (林前 9:24; 腓 3:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 授与竞赛得胜者的奖杯, 奖赏
2) 隐喻从天上而来, 给予基督徒好品格的赏赐 (林前 9:24; 腓 3:14)
